note.p: Engineer. Son of Theodore Grant Cresy. Married Kate Dobson in 1884. Died in India.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/1176/107/10), 1881 (RG11/872/68/23)
India deaths and burials, 1719–1948 (Ancestry.com, accessed 2 June 2020)
London, England, Church of England marriages and banns, 1754–1932 (Ancestry.com, accessed 2 June 2020)
